ygData.messageBody:
Might I ask where you got it?

Zolthar

>From: Arshad Rahman <arahman@...>
>
>If I remember correctly, this is a spell component, but I can't remember for
>what spell/class. Can someone refresh my memory? Thanks!
>
>(Got one from Lord Syrkl in Beholder)
>

research. Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be
tolerated, no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders
